alert.note: Alert for Cooper; Saline (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 06 at 7:09AM CDT until May 08 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Missouri... Blackwater River near Blue Lick affecting Saline and Cooper Counties. For the Blackwater River...including Blue Lick...Minor flooding is forecast. This product along with additional weather and stream information is available at www.weather.gov/kc/. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Blackwater River near Blue Lick. * WHEN...Until Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 24.0 feet, Cropland and pastures along the river flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:45 AM CDT Friday the stage was 23.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this morning to a crest of 24.8 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 24.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Obs Forecasts Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun 1pm 1pm 1pm Blackwater River Blue Lick 24.0 23.6 Fri 6am 24.2 24.5 18.9 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
